text: Alexa Irvin (born 20 July) is a Canadian sprint kayaker. She is the current Pan American Games champion in the women's K-4 500 metres, she won gold together with Andréanne Langlois, Alanna Bray-Lougheed, and Anna Negulic at the 2019 Pan American Games. Irvin also won gold in the K-4 500 metres at the 2011 Pan American Games. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Canadian female canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Living people Category:People from Prince Rupert, British Columbia Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia Category:Pan American Games medalists in canoeing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada
title: Alexa Irvin
